description:
Class Black prepares to put on a production of "Romeo and Juliet" for the school festival and another assassin tries her luck.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: How Do You Get a Bird Out of Its Cage?
Kago no Tori o Soto ni Dasu ni wa?
Que faut-il pour sortir un oiseau de sa cage ?
籠の鳥を外に出すには?
